text: Who was your man of the match tonight for England? Gerrard, Lallana, Sterling and Shaw all had solid games
FT 1-0 Some positives, a main one being Adam Lallana and also Luke Shaw, squad showed good signs, encouraging.
81'- GOAL Daniel Sturridge converts from Adam Lallana's fantastic piece of work to head past a helpless Schmeical. 1-0.
76'- Oxlade-Chamberlain comes on for Jordan Henderson.
71' - Welbeck produces another save from Schmeical after a clever ball from Henderson, Schemical also saves from Daniel Sturridge's effort.
66'- Welbeck pulls out a neat save from Schmeical shortly after Joe Hart produces an intelligent save.
Two Subs- The introductions of Luke Shaw and Adam Lallana replace Ashley Cole and Jack Wilshere.
HT England 0-0 Denmark. 45 Minutes of half chances where England have been unlucky. Denmark have applied occasional areas of pressure too.
45' - Just before Half-Time, Daniel Sturridge sees his effort from a corner denied by Kasper Schmeical who saved well. #England
41' - Raheem Sterling denied by the post, after he saw his effort from a drilled cross by Ashley Cole hit the woodwork. Still 0-0 #England
Daniel Sturridge's powerful cross-shot is missed by Wayne Rooney, arguably the best chance of the half. #England #EnglandvDenmark
England playing positively and with good attacking intent. Had a couple of half chances but looks positive.
